timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
KafkaResource.replaceKafkaResource(CLUSTER_NAME, kafka -> {
LOGGER.info("Changing cruise control performance tuning options");
CruiseControlSpec cruiseControl = new CruiseControlSpecBuilder()
.addToConfig(performanceTuningOpts).build();
kafka.getSpec().setCruiseControl(cruiseControl);
});
KafkaResource.replaceKafkaResource(CLUSTER_NAME, kafka -> {
LOGGER.info("Changing cruise control performance tuning options");
kafka = KafkaBuilder(kafka)
.editSpec()
.editCruiseControl()
.addToConfig(performanceTuningOpts)
.endCruiseControl()
.endSpec()
.build
});

I haven't ran this locally so unsure if it actually works, but this would be slightly more readable and guarantees the prior cruiseControl configuration is not lost (as we are not doing a replace but an edit)
